Package game.weapon

Class Broadsword

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.weapons.WeaponItem
game.weapon.Broadsword
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, Weapon
public class Broadsword
extends WeaponItem
The Broadsword class represents a type of weapon item in the game that can be used for attacks and has a focus skill. It extends the WeaponItem class and provides methods for allowable actions, tick functionality, and focus management.

      Overrides:

      Parameters:
